title: Impact of differentiation on demand curve

content.prompt: The demand curve for a monopolistically competitive firm is downward sloping because

choices.label: there are a large number of firms
the product is produced by using scarce resources
the products produced by different firms are not identical
it is easy for firms to enter or exit the market
the marginal cost rises as output produced increases

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
